{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question asks which option doesn't have an effect on pancreatic secretion. Among the options, Cck (Cholecystokinin) stimulates pancreatic enzyme secretion, Gastrin stimulates pancreatic acid secretion and is a potent stimulant of pancreatic enzyme secretion, Secretin stimulates bicarbonate-rich pancreatic juice secretion, and Gastric inhibitory polypeptide (GIP) has little effect on pancreatic secretion. Therefore, the correct answer is GIP.", "answer_choice": "D"}
